title: I'm Still Here: the sad truth about Joaquin Phoenix's great mental health hoax
text:
Joaquin Phoenix has never shied from dark, complex roles that question human nature. In HER, he played a lonely depressive who becomes infatuated with a female-voiced operating system. In You Were Never Really Here, he played a vigilante who kills rapists. This year, he stars in Joker as a misanthropic, failed comedian who takes his revenge against a world that has done him no favours.

And then, of course, there was the film I'm Still Here, an exploration of what it means to be damaged, requiring Phoenix to blur boundaries between acting, and real life.
